{{ECharts|option=
{
  "color": [ "#0e77ca", "#00924c", "#533eb4" ],
  "title": {
    "text": "所有生态区数据对比"
  },
  "backgroundColor": "rgba(255,255,255,0.3)",
  "tooltip": {
    "trigger": "axis",
    "axisPointer": {
      "type": "cross"
    }
  },
  "grid": {
    "top":  "20%",
    "right": "20%"
  },
  "toolbox": {
    "feature": {
      "dataView": {
        "show": "true",
        "readOnly": "false"
      },
      "saveAsImage": { "show": "true" }
    }
  },
  "legend": {
    "data": [ "动物密度", "植被密度", "疾病最大间隔时间" ]
  },
  "xAxis": [
    {
      "type": "category",
      "axisLabel":{
        "interval": 0,
        "rotate": 30
      },
      "data": [ {{#arraymap:{{#var:biomes}}|,|@@|"{{#show:@@|?label.zh-cn}}"|,}} ]
    }
  ],
  "yAxis": [
    {
      "type": "value",
      "name": "动物密度",
      "min": 0,
      "max": 10.0,
      "position": "right",
      "axisLine": {
        "lineStyle": {
          "color": "#0e77ca"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "value",
      "name": "植被密度",
      "min": 0,
      "max": 1.0,
      "position": "right",
      "offset": 80,
      "axisLine": {
        "lineStyle": {
          "color": "#00924c"
        }
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "value",
      "name": "疾病最大间隔时间",
      "min": 0,
      "max": 100,
      "position": "left",
      "axisLine": {
        "lineStyle": {
          "color": "#533eb4"
        }
      },
      "axisLabel": {
        "formatter": "{value} 天"
      }
    }
  ],
  "series": [
    {
      "name": "动物密度",
      "type": "bar",
      "barGap": "10%",
      "data": [ {{#arraymap:{{#var:biomes}}|,|@@|{{#show:@@|?animalDensity}}|,}} ]
    },
    {
      "name": "植被密度",
      "type": "bar",
      "yAxisIndex": 1,
      "data": [ {{#arraymap:{{#var:biomes}}|,|@@|{{#show:@@|?plantDensity}}|,}} ]
    },
    {
      "name": "疾病最大间隔时间",
      "type": "line",
      "yAxisIndex": 2,
      "data": [ {{#arraymap:{{#var:biomes}}|,|@@|{{#show:@@|?diseaseMtbDays}}|,}} ]
    }
  ]
}
}}
